BJCP Style Guidelines 2015

Source: R/data.R
bjcp2015.Rd

Beer style guidelines from the BJCP (Beer Judge Certification Program) A dataset containing the general statistics of 91 beer styles. Historical and wild beers are not included.

Usage

bjcp2015

Format

A data frame with 91 rows and 14 variables:

CategoryNo

Number of category

CategoryName

Name of category

Style_id

ID for beerstyle, a subcategory (number with letter)

BeerStyle

Name of beerstyle (= subcategory)

OGmin

Original Gravity, minimum value

OGmax

Original Gravity, maximum value

FGmin

Final Gravity, minimum value

FGmax

Final Gravity, maximum value

ABVmin

Alcohol-by-Volume, minimum value

ABVmax

Alcohol-by-Volume, maximum value

IBUmin

International Bittering Units, minimum value

IBUmax

International Bittering Units, maximum value

SRMmin

Standard Reference Method color, minimum value

SRMmax

Standard Reference Method color, maximum value

Source

https://bjcp.org/stylecenter.php
